menuitem.name: Nachos
menuitem.description: cheddar and monterey jack cheese, salsa, sour cream and guacamole. add jalapenos or black olives $.50 each

menuitem.name: Portabello Mushroom Cap
menuitem.description: Stuffed with crabmeat, andouille sausage and smoked tomato sauce

menuitem.name: Chicken Wings
menuitem.description: A dozen chicken Wings with blue cheese sauce. Two dozen for $8.75

menuitem.name: Quesadilla
menuitem.description: Chicken, black beans, guacamole, salsa, fresca and sour cream

menuitem.name: House Salad
menuitem.description: Small or large house salad with balsamic herbed vinaigrette

menuitem.name: Mesclun Salad
menuitem.description: with marinated mushrooms, roasted peppers, artichokes, fresh mossarella and balsamic vinaigrette

menuitem.name: Grilled Chicken Salad
menuitem.description: soy sesame marinade, mixed greens, red and green peoppers, carrots, red onion, crispy fried wontons and honey ginger dressing

menuitem.name: Duck Confit Pizza
menuitem.description: with caramelized onion, fresh thyme and goat cheese

menuitem.name: The Salty Pizza
menuitem.description: with proscuitto, black olives cotija cheese, tomatoes and anchovies

menuitem.name: Toppings
menuitem.description: Pepperoni, Sausage, Chicken, Grilled Portabello, Roasted Peppers, Sun Dried Tomatoes, Roasted Garlic, Broccoli Rabe, Spinach, Shrimp, Proscuitto, Black Olives, Goat Cheese, Bacon, Roasted Veggies, Green Peppers, Onions, Mushrooms

menuitem.name: Grilled Rib Eye Steak
menuitem.description: with buttermilk biscuits, vegetable of the day and button mushroom gravy

menuitem.name: Pork Tenderloin
menuitem.description: dry rubbed with swiss chard, maple whipped sweet potatoes and apple bourbon sauce

menuitem.name: Grilled Chicken
menuitem.description: with mushroom risotto pesto sauce and tomato salsa

menuitem.name: Center Cut Sirlion
menuitem.description: with cheddar cheese mashed potatoes, horseradish sour cream and vegetable of the day

menuitem.name: Milkshake
menuitem.description: vanilla, chocolate or strawberry; double thick, $5.00
